column5: When is it exactly and more importantly,Are there gonna be any kids around.I want to bring my girls on 2 trips this summer and we are gonna tent it whether on land or in my boat.I have a camper top that will suffice on the boat.Anyway are there going to be any kids at the g2g at lak air?Just wanna know before I tell the kids where we are going camping this summer.The other is temagami at finlayson point for sure like last year.Cheers and thanks in advance.
Both my kids should be there!!
I was just gonna say TJ's two are always there (for at least part of it)... but I wouldn't say it was a child appropriate affair at times...
Their is usually late nights with drinking and swearing around the campfire. Adult type kidding and somethings that kids might emulate but get in trouble for.   Art
from reports I have read and heard  I would say it is not a place for children
I could just imagine,LOL.Thanks guys!Should be a blast!So is a date set yet?And who do I contact at lak air.
LOL,im going to a 40bd pig roast next weekend.We send the kids inside,LOL as ussuall.
They might see the inebriated talking bear?  JF

Hes a very nice inebriated bear.If you rassle him he will give you the shirt off his back!He will even leave a fiver in the pocket of his shirt.I would bring my daughter there no problem.She will be 29 this year,I would hesitate if she was any younger. Joe
my 15 year old son (Daniel) will be there.

date: june 19th some people arrive a little earlier like friday or even thursday. just email kevin /leslie at lake air. heres the thread on it http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=40062&st=0&p=427357&hl=june%2019&fromsearch=1entry427357   and here is there web site http://globaltourism.com/cottage/153.htm
The Mrs. and I were planning on going, but she still has not shown much improvement to date.  Back to maybe next year
Thanks guys,my kids are 8 and 5.And if they were told that the bear has a fin in his pocket for candy,LOL He has no chance with my two,he would be mauled.LOLThanks again guys
